high_descs: Walk ahead to the box on the floor.
Pick up the box on the floor.
Turn around and walk to the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a box by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the cardboard box on the floor to the right.
Pick up the cardboard box from the floor.
Turn around and walk to the small nightstand with the lamp next to the bed.
anns.task_desc: Examine a box by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Move to the middle of the room against the wall where the empty box is on the floor
Pick up the box on the floor
Carry the box over to the night stand with the lamp on top of it
anns.task_desc: Carry a box while turning on a lamp
